overview: The Passion: A Brickfilm accurately portrays the story of Jesus' death and resurrection through the eyes of LEGO characters. From the garden of Gethsemane, to the resurrection, it is a beautiful look into the love and sacrifice of Jesus Christ. Shot on location in Uganda, Africa, featuring stunning visuals and historical sets that truly bring this Biblical story to life.
tagline: Witness the power of the cross like never before
title: The Passion: A Brickfilm
